articles.description: A student sought counseling help after panicking over a tuition bill. A weeklong stay in a psychiatric hospital followed — along with a $3,413 bill. The hospital soft-pedaled its charity care policy.
articles.content: Hofstra University student Divya Singh found herself beset by a double whammy of bills from two of the costliest kinds of institutions in America colleges and hospitals. After experiencing anxiety wh… [+8777 chars]
